TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Matabalay, title = Matabalay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matabalay} }

S.FORM: alang Matabalay ga niya mki sku Byori Keng atu Tayang go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 142 buwan, 380 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 74% kyan ku 283 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 26% kyan ku 97 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Tayan 71%, saySiyat 1%, Amis 2%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal psatu tegami ru pqniqan iyu. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Matabalay hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay 'zil na Matabalay hya' ga llyung. tay mkyahu' na Matabalay hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkraya' na Matabalay hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Matabalay hya' ga Gali-hwan. tay 'llaw na Matabalay hya' ga Mabatuan. rekisi kayal masikinut ku kayan runi kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan ungat la kisya' glagan spyangan na pinbahu ali 桂竹筍 ulyux 生薑 palikaway 李子 azimux 桃 ziluk na sayhu' 草莓 ralu' 甜柿 uwaw na itayal小米酒 Ubuy qqmayh

alang Matabalay ga niya mki sko Byori Keng ato Tayang go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 142 bowan, 380 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 74% kyan ko 283 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 26% kyan ko 97 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Tayan 71%, saySiyat 1%, Amis 2%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal psato tegami ro pqniqan iyo. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Matabalay hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay 'zil na Matabalay hya' ga llyong. tay mkyaho' na Matabalay hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkraya' na Matabalay hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Matabalay hya' ga Gali-hwan. tay 'llaw na Matabalay hya' ga Mabatoan. rekisi kayal masikinot ko kayan roni kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan ongat la kisya' glagan spyangan na pinbaho ali 桂竹筍 olyox 生薑 palikaway 李子 azimox 桃 zilok na sayho' 草莓 ralo' 甜柿 owaw na itayal小米酒 Uboy qqmayh
